### Key:      
#### -Red symbols: activated sludge       
#### -Green symbols: lagoons      
#### -Blue symbols: other technology
      
#### This map shows all the wastewater treatment plants in Oregon that are less than 1 MGD for which we have cost data. For more information on an individual plant, you can click on a symbol on the map. The data used in this map is from the "Cost Data (From USDA)" subsection of the "Data" tab on this website.
